alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND NORTHERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over New Holland, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Greenfield, Kingston, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Good Hope, Frankfort, Clarksburg, Deer Creek Lake, Andersonville, Austin, Pickaway County Airport, Rock Mills, Pancoastburg and Plano. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
